1682240.name: Deck Adventurers - Heroes of the Valley
1682240.description:
Deck Adventurers - Heroes of the Valley is a turn-based tactical combat and deck-building RPG game, and is the continuation of Deck Adventurers - Origins:



But with new features that add more tactical depth, because characters are fighting on a grid, which allows:
- Movement of heroes and their enemies on the battlefield.
- Attack range, zone damage, attacks from behind...
- Larger groups of enemies.

Explore the map of the Valley, helping its inhabitants and expelling dangerous monsters.

Recruit new heroes and helpers, and combine their skills to create different groups of adventurers.

Unlock new cards and upgrades, to enhance your various decks.

Create the perfect combination of adventurers and cards, to defeat the most dangerous enemies.
1682240.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
